MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:35pm due to a fault on the underground cable network on Orchard Brae Gardens and this may affect the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing difficulties onsite and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:12am on 21 November 2020.
